It includes modules on introducing cloud architecting, adding storage, compute, and database layers, creating networking environments, connecting networks, securing user and application access, implementing elasticity, high availability, and monitoring, automating architecture, caching content, building decoupled architectures, building microservices and serverless architectures, and planning for disaster. full_text:
COURSE NAME: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate

COURSE OVERVIEW: The course is designed to provide comprehensive training in cloud architecting using AWS. Participants will gain skills in storage, compute, database, networking, security, elasticity, high availability, monitoring, automation, caching, decoupled architectures, microservices, serverless architectures, and disaster planning. The course also prepares participants for AWS certification.

PREREQUISITES: Participants should have AWS Practitioner certification or equivalent knowledge.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 01.11.2024
- Duration: 20 sessions over 100 academic hours
- Schedule: Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Hybrid learning: Classes will be held at Bar-Ilan University campus in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, according to participants' choice.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Welcome to AWS Academy Cloud Architecting
- Introducing Cloud Architecting
- Adding a Storage Layer
- Adding a Compute Layer
- Adding a Database Layer
- Creating a Networking Environment
- Connecting Networks
- Securing User and Application Access
- Implementing Elasticity, High Availability, and Monitoring
- Automating Your Architecture
- Caching Content
- Building Decoupled Architectures
- Building Microservices and Serverless Architectures
- Planning for Disaster
- Bridging to Certification

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an interview and register, contact Esther Asulin at 052-5886002 or esther.asulin@biu.ac.il

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: Bar-Ilan University invites you to join the leading certification in the cloud domain, offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber.
